name: UAC Bypass Abusing Winsat Path Parsing - Process
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using a path parsing issue in winsat.exe (UACMe 52)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.IntegrityLevel:(High OR System) AND process.parent.executable:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\system32\\winsat.exe AND process.parent.command_line:*C\:\\Windows\ \\system32\\winsat.exe*)`
